description:
Keep Your Cheque Books And Credit Cards In Place Move Away From Hassles Of Searching In A Hay Way Manner.
cheque Book Holder Can Be Carried To Interviews , Meetings Or Personal Use .
this Is Elegant Multi Pocket Faux Leather Cheque Book Holder With Zip Closure From Coi .
the Size Of This Folder When Closed Is 11 Inch X 5.5 Inch .
exceptional Design And Attractive Interior Design With One See Through Covered Credit Card / Business Card Slots
